discourse_list.title: New Additional Appointment to MIP Editor - @Gala

content.content: It is my great pleasure to announce that I am using my Governance Facilitator Powers (with full support from @Patrick_J ) defined in MIP 0 to appoint a second MIP Editor, @Gala. Under the supervision of @blimpa, Gala has taken on nearly all duties expected of a MIP Editor while offering perspective on how we can improve our MIPs-related output. I have full confidence in Gala and trust her judgement on all MIPs related maters. For the community, not too much should change but we have another officially appointed person to deliver decisions about MIPs and take ownership over the process. We expect to continue our rise in MIPs-related content and with another official MIP Editor we believe we can keep serving the community and delivering value to MKR holders.  A bit overdue, @Gala. Thank you for your continued commitment to the team and I look forward to seeing all you accomplish in your official duties

Thank you @prose11 for your kind words and support! I am happy and excited about this - now officially - new role. I want to thank @blimpa for all the commitment and patience! You were great at the onboarding and please continue to be my supervisor  Looking forward to keep serving the community
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
